unnormalised: Hey guys, anyone read about Milkha Singh's bio? "Bhaag Milkha Bhaag" movie really made it famous! These athlete biographies are so inspiring, especially for youngsters dreaming of playing for India. It reminds me of my time at IIT Madras, watching sports. Do you know any good books about Mary Kom or other Indian athletes? Would love recommendations! Maybe I should write one myself someday.
